meaningMnemonic: You <radical>run</radical> and <radical>call</radical> out to people at the same time because you're <kanji>super</kanji> <kanji>ultra</kanji> excited right now. You have a super crazy amount of energy you need to get out with your running and calling.
readingMnemonic: You're just becoming <kanji>ultra</kanji> tired when you hear a terrifying sound. It's Mrs. <reading>Chou</reading> (ちょう) barreling down toward you. "WERE YOU CALLING FOR ME, CHILD?!" she screams.
